```{r}
dt_arse<- arse[c(1,2,5,6,10)] |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = c(Analyte_Code),
              values_from = c(Result))

dt<-dt_arse |> 
  dplyr::group_by(Visit) |>
  skim()

write_csv(dt, "summ4.csv")
```
